MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Trewan Crossing and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.55am.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 10.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.41AM on 18th April 2021
